name:
Step 4.5: Warp Travel Encounters: Roll on Warp Travel Encounters Table once per 5 Days of travel, add +20 if passing "Chart Vessel Course".
Every 5 Full days of Warp travel, Navigator rolls on Warp Travel Encounters Table (minimum 1 roll). If Navigator succeeded at Step 3's Chart Vessel Course Test, they add +20 to the roll.
